definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The history and current situation of Polymeric Photorefractive Materials are Outlined.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了光折变聚合物材料的发展历史和现状。

sentences.english: Up to date, the doped lithium niobate crystal is the most ideal three dimensional storage materi…
sentences.chinese: 搀杂铌酸锂晶体是目前最理想的三维光折变存储材料。

sentences.english: Nonlinear materials have been well established as photo refractive switching material.
sentences.chinese: 非线性材料已经用于光折变开关。

sentences.english: Photorefractive four wave mixing with rapidly amplitude modulated beams is studied theoretically.
sentences.chinese: 对高速调幅光束的光折变四波混频进行了理论研究。

sentences.english: Real-time processing can be achieved if photorefractive material is used.
sentences.chinese: 若利用光致折变晶体可实现实时在线提取。

sentences.english: Photorefractive polymer is a novel functional polymer reported at beginning of 1990'.
sentences.chinese: 光折变聚合物是90年代出现的一种新型功能高分子。

sentences.english: The temporal behavior of photorefractive spatial solitons is studied in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要对光折变空间光孤子的时间行为进行了研究。

sentences.english: The band transport model is now a widely accepted photorefractive theory.
sentences.chinese: 带输运模型是目前被广泛接受的光折变理论。

sentences.english: And we also analysis the parameters in the photorefractive two-beam coupling experiment.
sentences.chinese: 并对光折变二波耦合实验中一些参数选择进行了分析。
